title: Area code  784
description: Area code  784 is the local telephone area code of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. The  784 area code, or "SVG", was created during a split from the original  809 area code which began permissive dialing  1 June  1998 and ended  1 June  1999.
history: The  784 area code, or "SVG", was created during a split from the original  809 area code which began permissive dialing  1 June  1998 and ended  1 June  1999.
callingProcedure:
When in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, dial the local seven digit phone number alone.
When calling to Saint Vincent and the Grenadines from anywhere in the United States, Canada, and most other Caribbean islands of the North American Numbering Plan, dial  1 +  784 + the local seven digit phone number.
